SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
This class represents all the methods an admin can execute
AdminActivity
 
AdminNotificationsFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
AdminSession
This class represents the data that is associated with an admin, such as whether or not they are in admin mode or not, or their userID
AllEntrantsListFragment
Fragment for displaying a ListView of all entrants for the selected event Will fetch a list of all entrants from the database and display them in a ListView Navigated to from EntrantListSelectionFragment
AllEventPostersUserFragment
A fragment that displays all the users that have event poster images
AllProfilesFragment
This fragment displays all of the possible profiles for the admin Will fetch all users from the database to display in the listview Navigated to from AdminActivity
CancelledEntrantListFragment
Displays a listview of all cancelled entrants for the selected event Will fetch all cancelled entrants from the database to display in the listview Navigated to from EntrantListSelectionFragment
ChosenEntrantListFragment
Displays a listview of chosen entrants that includes chosen entrants.
ContentActivity
Activity that displays the main
CreateOrEditEventFragment
Allows the user to create and event or edit an event that they have created Prompts user to input all necessary information for creating an event, then adds event to the database
Database
An instance of this class represents a connection to the firebase firestore database.
DatabaseIntegrationTests
 
DeleteProfileFragment
Allows user to permanently remove their account from the database Provides a textual warning to the user that deletion is permanent
EditEventActivity
EditEventActivity This activity provides options related to event editing, sending notifications to entrants, and viewing the list of entrants Contains a NavHostFragment to display fragments related to this activity and a sets up a BottomNavigationView to quickly swap between EventDetailScreenFragment, EntrantListSelectionFragment, and OrganiserNotificationsUIFragment Retrieves the eventId from the intent and puts it in a bundle to be used by related fragments
Entrant
An instance of this class bundles the metadata of the user joining a particular event
EntrantList
An instance of this class represents the waiting lists for a single event
EntrantListLocationTracking
 
EntrantListSelectionFragment
EntrantListSelectionFragment Displays the categories of entrants and allows the user to navigate to the respective fragment for viewing the chosen list of entrants User can choose to see all entrants, chosen entrants, pending entrants, cancelled entrants, and finalised list of entrants, with buttons linking to AllEntrantsListFragment, ChosenEntrantListFragment, WaitingEntrantListFragment, CancelledEntrantListFragment, and FinalEntrantListFragment
EntrantLocation
A small dataclass that represents the high cohesion data of the latitude and longitude of the entrant's joining to the event
EntrantMapsFragment
This fragment uses a google maps API to display a mapview of where all entrants joined the waiting list from, where we navigate from EntrantListSelectionFragment
EntrantStatus
The enumeration for the different statuses that the entrant can have while in the waiting list for an event
Event
An instance of this object represents a single instance of an event
EventAdapter
This class is the ArrayAdapter that is used to display the lists of events in a well organized and visually appealing format
EventDetailScreenFragment
EventDetailScreenFragment This fragment displays the details for a selected event Gets the eventId from arguments and fetches the event from the database Displays fetched data including the name, description, tags, and an uploaded image Gets the current activity, if it is ContentActivity then treats the user like an entrant and allows the user to join the waitlist for the event If the current activity is EditEventActivity then treats the user like the organiser and displays options for editing the event Currently does not display options for editing the event
EventNotificationManager
This class is designed to provide methods to the rest of the program for sending notifications to the entrants in certain entrant lists, without having to worry about the details of how we are sending the notification
EventsUIFragment
Displays a listview of all available events that the user can join, as well as an option to go to MyEventsFragment to view the user's created events and to create a new event in CreateOrEditEventFragment Fetches an array of events from the database then displays them textually in a listview Allows the user to click on any event in the list to open up a detailed view of the event in EventDetailScreenFragment
EventTagsAdapter
EventTagsAdapter is used by EventDetailScreenFragment to fetch strings to display in the HorizontalRVActivity
EventTagsAdapter.TagViewHolder
For holder reusability, instead of inflating each time, each TagViewHolder holds references to the views inside one Tag
EventUnitTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FinalEntrantListFragment
Displays a listview of all final entrants that have accepted an invitation to join the event Will fetch a list of final entrants from the database to be displayed in the listview
FirstTimeUserInfoFragment
Fragment for first time user registration Has options to cancel and return back to RegisterScreenFragment or to confirm information after filling in the required information fields and proceed to LotteryGuidelinesFragment Adds the user to the database along with corresponding information
HorizontalRVActivity
HorizontalRVActivity is used by EventDetailScreenFragment to get tags to display in a horizontal list view
ImageStorage
An singleton instance of this class represents a image storage bucket (currently on Firebase)
ImageStorageIntegrationTests
 
LotteryAlarmReceiver
When the scheduled alarm triggers, this class contains the functionality needed to call the draw function for the event
LotteryDrawScheduler
When an event is scheduled, this class schedules the alarm on the organizer's phone to call the draw at the event registration deadline for the next users
LotteryFirebaseMessagingService
This class inherits functionality from the already created and built in FirebaseMessagingService class, and this class is responsible for handling the notification event when the app receives a push notification from Firebase
LotteryGuidelinesFragment
Displays the lottery guidelines and important information with how the lottery works for first time user registration Allows the user to cancel to go back to FirstTimeUserInfoFragment Allows the user to confirm to go to ContentActivity
LotterySelector
Lottery selector that contains methods for selecting from the waiting list and drawing replacement users
LotterySelectorUnitTest
 
MainActivity
First activity upon app launch Retrieves device Id and determines if user should go to RegisterActivity or ContentActivity depending on existence of deviceId in the database
MyEventsFragment
Displays the user's current events that they are organising Fetches a list of events filtered by a matching organiser id to the user's id and displays in a listview
Notification
An instance of this class represents a single notification that is sent out from some event
NotificationChannelFactory
This class is follows the factory method pattern to create all of the notification channels in one place instead of all over the program, making it really easy to add more notification channels as needed
NotificationSender
This class contains the method needed to send a notification that is generated in the app to the appropriate firebase function, which will then use Firebase Messaging Service to send a push notification to all devices
NotificationsUIFragment
Displays a the user's notifications from all sources according to the user's notification preferences Fetches the user's notifications from the database and displays in a listview
OrganiserNotificationsUIFragment
OrganiserNotificationUIFragment Displays the options for sending notifications to either Waitlist Entrants, Chose Entrants, or Cancelled Entrants.
OrganiserSendNotificationUIFragment
OrganiserSendNotificationUIFragment Allows the user who is an organiser to send a message/notification to all entrants of the selected category based on previous input in OrganiserNotificationsUIFragment EditTextview requires text to be inputted, otherwise error message will appear 'Send Notification' button will add the notification to the database and send the notification to appropriate entrants
ProfileUIFragment
Displays the user's information and allows edits Fetches the user's name, email, and phone number if it exists and displays it Allows the user to view history by navigating to UserEventHistoryFragment, to confirm updates to their information with the update profile button, and to delete their profile by navigating to DeleteProfileFragment
RegisterActivity
Register activity for the app where a first time user can input their information and register their account based on device identification
RegisterScreenFragment
Displays the first time app logo and register button and a button to navigate to FirstTimeUserInfoFragment
SettingsNotificationsFragment
SettingsNotificationFragment Fragment for displaying notification related settings Allows the user to opt in or out of some notifications from the app, namely Lottery notifications, admin notifications, and organiser notifications This fragment will then update the user's preferences in the database Currently this fragment does not update the user's preferences regardless of the user's input
SettingsTOSFragment
SettingsTOSFragment Fragment for displaying the terms of service and how the lottery system works Repeat of what is initially showed in LotteryGuidelinesFragment so that the user can view lottery information at all times
SettingsUIFragment
SettingsUIFragment Menu to display buttons to navigate to sub-menus for notification settings and important information Non-admin users will have two buttons labelled as such that navigate to the fragments Admin users will have the previous buttons and an addition button that swaps to admin view
SharedUserViewModel
For first time user info fragment to share user info to lottery selection guidelines so committing to database is delayed
User
An instance of this class represents a single user
UserEventHistoryFragment
Displays the user's past events and information relating to their acceptance or rejection Fetches events from the database and displays them in a list view
UserEventPostersFragment
Fragment that displays the specified user's uploaded event poster images in a simple ListView along with a delete button to its right
UserUnitTest
 
Verification
This class contains methods for verifying inputs.
ViewNotificationFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
WaitingEntrantListFragment
WaitingEntrantListFragment Fragment that displays a ListView of all waiting entrants that have yet to accept an invitation to join the event Navigated to from EntrantListSelectionFragment
